titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the disallowance of the marital deduction where the spouse is not a United States citizen for purposes of estate and gift taxes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/20/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal provisions disallowing the marital deduction where the spouse is not a U.S. citizen for purposes of the estate and gift taxes.
